task_text: Which employee in Paris is busiest

text_blocks:
I found 5 Paris Office employees so far:
- 6KR2_020: Marine Guerin
- 6KR2_021: Agathe Marty
- 6KR2_022: Pierre Mercier
- 6KR2_023: Olivier André
- 6KR2_024: Laurent Pons

Let me continue listing employees to make sure I have all Paris employees, then I'll need to get their project workloads.
I still see only those 5 Paris employees. Let me continue to verify and then get their workloads by checking their project assignments.

I've confirmed all employees. The Paris Office employees are:
- 6KR2_020: Marine Guerin
- 6KR2_021: Agathe Marty
- 6KR2_022: Pierre Mercier
- 6KR2_023: Olivier André
- 6KR2_024: Laurent Pons

Now I need to find the project assignments for each of these employees to calculate their workload. Let me use find_projects_by_employee for each Paris employee.

project.name: HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies
project.description: Development and validation of a high-value anti-corrosion coating system for rail bogies.

project.name: Bridge steel anti-corrosion package
project.description: Multi-coat anti-corrosion package for bridge and viaduct steel structures along the Danube.

project.name: Quick-clean primer for machinery line
project.description: Fast-cleaning shop-floor primer to reduce line downtime at Machina Press Systems.

project.name: Press line coating rationalisation
project.description: Rationalisation of Machina Press coating portfolio across multiple press and conveyor lines.

text_blocks:
Now I have all the workload information for Paris employees:

| Employee | Name | Projects | Total FTE |
|----------|------|----------|-----------|
| 6KR2_020 | Marine Guerin | 2 projects (0.3 + 0.4) | **0.7** |
| 6KR2_021 | Agathe Marty | 0 projects | 0.0 |
| 6KR2_022 | Pierre Mercier | 1 project (0.3) | 0.3 |
| 6KR2_023 | Olivier André | 0 projects | 0.0 |
| 6KR2_024 | Laurent Pons | 1 project (0.3) | 0.3 |

The busiest employee in Paris is **Marine Guerin** with a workload of 0.7 FTE across 2 projects.

input.message:
The busiest employee in Paris is **Marine Guerin** with a workload of 0.7 FTE.

She is assigned to 2 projects:
- HV anti-corrosion system for rail bogies (0.3 FTE as Engineer)
- Bridge steel anti-corrosion package (0.4 FTE as Lead)

For comparison, the other Paris employees have:
- Pierre Mercier: 0.3 FTE (1 project)
- Laurent Pons: 0.3 FTE (1 project)
- Agathe Marty: 0.0 FTE (no projects)
- Olivier André: 0.0 FTE (no projects)

summary:
ok_answer: The busiest employee in Paris is **Marine Guerin** with a workload of 0.7 FTE.

She is assigned to 2
